mapper.select: SELECT FORM_CODE, FORM_NAME FROM DOC_FORM ORDER BY FORM_CODE
SELECT PERIOD_CODE, PERIOD FROM DOC_RETENTION_PERIOD ORDER BY PERIOD_CODE
SELECT SECURITY_CODE, SECURITY_LEVLE, READABLE_POSITION FROM DOC_SECURITY_LEVLE ORDER BY SECURITY_CODE

SELECT DF.FORM_CODE, DT.FORM_DETAIL_CODE, DFM.FORM_DETAIL_SEQ, DT.FORM_DETAIL_NAME, DT.FORM_DETAIL_TYPE FROM DOC_FORM_MAPPING DFM INNER JOIN DOC_FORM_DETAIL_TEMPLATE DT ON DT.FORM_DETAIL_CODE = DFM.FORM_DETAIL_CODE INNER JOIN DOC_FORM DF ON DF.FORM_CODE = DFM.FORM_CODE WHERE DF.FORM_CODE = #{formCode} ORDER BY DFM.FORM_DETAIL_SEQ
